## SynQLite class

The main class for managing SQLite3 synchronisation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SynQLite 
```

## Remarks

Expects SQLite3 version &gt;<!-- -->=3.45.1

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opts)](./synqlite-node.synqlite._constructor_.md) |  | Configure new SynQLite instance. |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [db](./synqlite-node.synqlite.db.md) | <code>readonly</code> | any | better-sqlite3 instance (See [BetterSqlite3](https://github.com/WiseLibs/better-sqlite3/blob/master/docs/api.md)<!-- -->) |
|  [dbPath](./synqlite-node.synqlite.dbpath.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Path to DB file |
|  [deviceId](./synqlite-node.synqlite.deviceid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | Automatically generated ID for device's DB instance. |
|  [synqBatchSize](./synqlite-node.synqlite.synqbatchsize.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Number of records to process in each batch when syncing changes. |
|  [synqDbId](./synqlite-node.synqlite.synqdbid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | Alias for [SynQLite.deviceId](./synqlite-node.synqlite.deviceid.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [synqPrefix](./synqlite-node.synqlite.synqprefix.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | The prefix used for SynQLite's tables. |
|  [synqTables](./synqlite-node.synqlite.synqtables.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Record&lt;string, [SyncableTable](./synqlite-node.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| undefined | Object containing [SyncableTable](./synqlite-node.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->s, keyed by table name. |
|  [utils](./synqlite-node.synqlite.utils.md) |  | Utils | <p>Basic Helpers.</p><p> move to a separate file.</p> |
|  [wal](./synqlite-node.synqlite.wal.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Enable or disable WAL mode. |

|  [disableDebug()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.disabledebug.md) |  | Writes debug mode value (false) which disables recording of operations on syncable tables. |
|  [enableDebug()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.enabledebug.md) |  | Writes debug mode value (true) which disables recording of operations on syncable tables. |
|  [getById(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getbyid.md) |  | Retrieves a single record by it's ID. |
|  [getChanges(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getchanges.md) |  | Returns matching [Change](./synqlite-node.change.md) objects since the last local sync. |
|  [getChangesSinceLastSync(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getchangessincelastsync.md) |  | Returns [Change](./synqlite-node.change.md) objects since the last local sync. |
|  [getDeviceId()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getdeviceid.md) |  | Returns the current device's unique SynQLite ID. |
|  [getLastSync()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getlastsync.md) |  | Returns an ISO8601 formatted date and time of the last successful local sync. |
|  [getPending()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getpending.md) |  | Returns changes that couldn't be applied yet because they were received out of sequence. |
|  [getRecordMeta(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.getrecordmeta.md) |  | Get associated meta data (including <code>vclock</code>) for record. |

|  [run(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.run.md) |  | Run an operation against the DB |
|  [runMany(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.runmany.md) |  | Run multiple operations against the DB |
|  [runQuery(params)](./synqlite-node.synqlite.runquery.md) |  | Run an operation against the DB |
|  [setDeviceId()](./synqlite-node.synqlite.setdeviceid.md) |  | If not already set, generates and sets deviceId. |
